page.title: 03Colstrope Farm-Arable.
page.content: olstrope is a dairy farm but it has about 80 acres of barley and 20 acres of wheat.This is the first time we have grown this variety of wheat and if it produces good results,we may put many more acres down to it.The other 200 acres of land are for grazing,silage and hay. On the farm we have 4 tractors;an old Massey Ferguson,a Ford and 2 Renaults.The implements for the arable side of the farm are a drill,rollers, discs,disc-harrows,cultivator,plough, crop sprayer,fertiliser and most important of all,a combine harvester. The other side of the farm is grass for silage.We have just completed the first cut but hay-making will have to wait for better weather.
